title: _act_
author: _act_
content: You can read the news from this site: https://cointelegraph.com/news/sec-approves-new-york-stock-exchange-listing-bitcoin-options-etfThis is about United States but it is worth discussing about. The important part:QuoteOn Oct. 18, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved the New York Stock Exchange’s application to list the long-anticipated options for spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs).Options trading will now be available for the 11 approved ETF providers, including Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund, ARK21Shares Bitcoin ETF, the Invesco Galaxy Bitcoin ETF, the Franklin Bitcoin ETF, the VanEck Bitcoin Trust, WisdomTree’s Bitcoin Fund, Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust, the Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust, the Bitwise Bitcoin ETF, BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF, and the Valkyrie Bitcoin Fund.

comments.author: Perfectbaby

The important part:QuoteOn Oct. 18, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved the New York Stock Exchange’s application to list the long-anticipated options for spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs).Options trading will now be available for the 11 approved ETF providers, including Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund, ARK21Shares Bitcoin ETF, the Invesco Galaxy Bitcoin ETF, the Franklin Bitcoin ETF, the VanEck Bitcoin Trust, WisdomTree’s Bitcoin Fund, Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust, the Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust, the Bitwise Bitcoin ETF, BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF, and the Valkyrie Bitcoin Fund.This is a big credit to bitcoin growth and price,  and I believe it would also spike the price to how people has been predicting it for long now, and would remain bullish and of course gradually bitcoin is moving to adoption.

comments.author: Sonia_123
comments.body: US SEC Greenlights NYSE Options Trading For Spot Bitcoin ETFs.The SEC approval of NYSE options trading on Spot Bitcoin ETFs, has unlocked new opportunities for investors and has also madeBitcoin rises 3% after SEC approval of NYSE options, with analysts predicting a potential surge past $70,000 in coming weeks.https://coingape.com/us-sec-greenlights-nyse-options-trading-for-spot-bitcoin-etfs/

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on October 18, 2024, 09:52:18 PMYou can read the news from this site: https://cointelegraph.com/news/sec-approves-new-york-stock-exchange-listing-bitcoin-options-etfThis is about United States but it is worth discussing about. The important part:QuoteOn Oct. 18, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) approved the New York Stock Exchange’s application to list the long-anticipated options for spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs).Options trading will now be available for the 11 approved ETF providers, including Fidelity Wise Origin Bitcoin Fund, ARK21Shares Bitcoin ETF, the Invesco Galaxy Bitcoin ETF, the Franklin Bitcoin ETF, the VanEck Bitcoin Trust, WisdomTree’s Bitcoin Fund, Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust, the Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust, the Bitwise Bitcoin ETF, BlackRock's iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF, and the Valkyrie Bitcoin Fund.This is the filed application to list option by Chicago Board Option in August 2024Wow...people eyes have opened to see the future of bitcoin, and the smart ones are using this early opportunity to accumulate a lot for themselves. NYSE and CBOE are now Bitcoin ETF, no one wants to miss the train, we will still see more approvals by SEC in future. Bitcoin is winning and we bitcoiners are winners. Good news for bitcoin, the bad news is that in future majority of bitcoin will be in third party custody. I hope you don't fall for that. The odd of bitcoin price going to the moon is very high than going to zero. Keep stacking more sats.
